name: NSOrderedCollectionDifference
desc: An object representing the difference between two ordered collections.

items.name: var hasChanges: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the difference has changes.

items.name: var insertions: [NSOrderedCollectionChange]
items.desc: A collection of insertion change objects.

items.name: var removals: [NSOrderedCollectionChange]
items.desc: A collection of removal change objects.

items.name: class NSOrderedCollectionChange
items.desc: An object that represents an indexed change within an ordered collection.

items.name: enum NSCollectionChangeType
items.desc: The type of change represented in computing the difference of an ordered collection.

items.name: func inverse() -> Self
items.desc: Calculate the difference between two objects in the reverse direction of comparison.

items.name: init(changes: [NSOrderedCollectionChange])
items.desc: Creates an ordered collection difference using an array of ordered collection changes.

items.name: init(insert: IndexSet, insertedObjects: [Any]?, remove: IndexSet, removedObjects: [Any]?)
items.desc: Creates an ordered collection difference from arrays of inserted and removed objects with corresponding sets of indices.

items.name: init(insert: IndexSet, insertedObjects: [Any]?, remove: IndexSet, removedObjects: [Any]?, additionalChanges: [NSOrderedCollectionChange])
items.desc: Creates an ordered collection difference from arrays of inserted and removed objects with corresponding sets of indices, in addition to an array of ordered collection changes.

items.name: func transformingChanges((NSOrderedCollectionChange) -> NSOrderedCollectionChange) -> CollectionDifference<Any>
items.desc: Create a new ordered collection difference by mapping over this differenceâ€™s members, processing the change objects with the block provided.
